name: Lucky Puzzle Blast
description:
Click to match similar fruits to quickly eliminate the cubes! Come and experience！

Still playing to eliminate? Has been updated! Come and experience our new gameplay and eliminate cubes together

Do you know how to play mahjong?
*Lucky Puzzle Blast ，not mahjong, and give you a sense of mahjong experience! Touch the fruits of the same kind, and three can be quickly eliminated! When you have not enough tiles and you are not satisfied that there are three cubes of the same kind, the game will be out of the game.

How to play:
*Click on the fruit square on the desktop, it will automatically move to your own lower panel interface

*When three blocks of the same type are met, it can be eliminated. The gray interface is a non-clickable area, and the top block must be clicked first

*The game will fail when the tiles below you are lined up with squares and cannot be eliminated

Come and experience our new gameplay and challenge your placement ability!
